attributes.additional_details: the risk of a RELEASE of nuclear weapons due to human error or a system error is far to high to continue to have them any more , there 15000 nuclear weapons world wide  , it is time for the world to get rid of them
attributes.background: nuclear weapons have been a threat to world safety since there first use in 1945 , there have been many accidents with nuclear weapons 32 in the uk , 1250 in the usa ,92 nuclear weapons have been lost at sea , 110 alerts in the uk alone , it is time all nuclear weapons where removed world wide

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to work with other countries on nuclear disarmament, if that's what you want to happen.
